data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Outgoing Invoice Contents'
define view entity zetr_ddl_i_outgoing_invcont
  as select from    zetr_t_arcd                                                    as Archive
    inner join      zetr_t_oginv                                                   as Invoice      on Invoice.docui = Archive.docui
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'ZETR_D_EDCTY' ) as DocumentType on  DocumentType.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                   and DocumentType.value_low = Archive.docty
  association to parent zetr_ddl_i_outgoing_invoices as _outgoingInvoices on $projection.DocumentUUID = _outgoingInvoices.DocumentUUID
{
  key Archive.docui                               as DocumentUUID,
  key Archive.conty                               as ContentType,
  key Archive.docty                               as DocumentType,
      DocumentType.text                           as DocumentTypeText,
      Invoice.bukrs                               as CompanyCode,
      Archive.contn                               as Content,
      cast(
      case Archive.conty when 'PDF' then 'application/pdf'
                 when 'UBL' then 'text/xml'
                 when 'HTML' then 'text/html'
                 else '' end as zetr_e_mimet )    as MimeType,
      cast(
      case Archive.conty when 'PDF' then concat( case when Invoice.invno is not initial then Invoice.invno else Invoice.belnr end, '.pdf' )
                 when 'UBL' then concat( case when Invoice.invno is not initial then Invoice.invno else Invoice.belnr end, '.xml' )
                 when 'HTML' then concat( case when Invoice.invno is not initial then Invoice.invno else Invoice.belnr end, '.html' )
                 else '' end as zetr_e_filename ) as Filename,
      //      Archive.arcid                               as ArchiveUUID,
      _outgoingInvoices
}

],
